activity.subtitle: We’ve brought many psychological techniques together in one place, so you can find what works best for you.
Each technique has a rating—choose the ones that help you most.

coping.subtitle: Learn to gently reframe unhelpful beliefs.
Use cards to gradually replace unhelpful beliefs with more realistic, supportive ones.

daybook.subtitle: Keep daily entries in a convenient format and write freely.
AI will analyze your entries and help you see the situation from a new perspective.

diary.subtitle: Tools for analyzing automatic thoughts and replacing them with healthier, more adaptive ones.
The diary is tightly integrated with AI to help you formulate and analyze thoughts.
You’ll find clear guidance at every step on how to use the diary effectively.

intermediate.subtitle: Gradually go deeper to explore the roots of your experiences at the level of intermediate beliefs.
Save unhelpful beliefs on coping cards and replace them with more realistic, supportive ones.
Intermediate beliefs shape automatic thoughts. Link them to better understand your reactions and track patterns over time.
